description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Conquer Galaxies across the entire universe in InterGalaXia. You can play 3 game modes including Arcade, OSK (Survival) or Story (Mission) mode. Featuring unlimited galaxy generation meaning that two games will NEVER be the same. Select your weapons, choose your galaxy and go conquer it!
description.short: Conquer Galaxies across the entire universe in InterGalaXia. You can play 3 game modes including Arcade, OSK (Survival) or Story (Mission) mode.
